title: Azusa, Otetsudai Shimasu! (Azusa Will Help!)
synopsis: The Karugamo High School Baseball Team has not been doing well. After losing badly to the Eagles, many of the players leave, and the team now has only eight players, one too few to play a game.
characters: ['Azusa', 'Harumaki, Senzou', 'Harumaki, Shunpei', 'Yamada, Ichiro', 'Nakasato, Akira', 'Temple Reverend', 'Tanabe', 'Tonomura', 'Mizuho, Yuuki']
